name: Knowledge Lecture On Android
description:
Basic knowledge of basic driving development based on Android.

  This lecture will introduce the basic knowledge of Android development, build the development environment, drive the introduction and the basic knowledge of the Linux kernel; The essential technology of Android's underlying development; Migration knowledge commonly used in the Android system.

name: Cloud Computing

venue.name: Room 105, Building No. 3
venue.address_1: HuangjiahuaXi Road # 2,Wuhan University of Science and Technology

description: Cloud computing is now changing the mode of information processing and service. It has become the basic infrastructure of the society. There are many innovations based on cloud computing. In this activity, cloud computing is introduced to the audiences about the key points. Special cases will be also provided here.

name: Framework, Platform and Business of Cloud Computing

venue.name: Room 412, Building No. 6
venue.address_1: Hubei University of Chinese Medicine

description: The overview of cloud computing will be introduced in this lecture. It is shared that what is the basic infrastructure of cloud computing and how to design it. And the typical platforms are also introduced. Some cases will be given and analyzed for further and deeply understanding. The business value is also provided here.

name: Bigdata and Cloud Computing

venue.name: Room6102,Building No.6
venue.address_1: HuangJiaDaWan NO.1,City College, Wuhan University of Science and Technology Wuhan

description: The overview of cloud computing will be introduced in this lecture. It is shared that what is the basic infrastructure of cloud computing and how to design it. And the typical platforms are also introduced. Some cases will be given and analyzed for further and deeply understanding. The business value is also provided here.

name: WuHan Android Developer Forum

venue.name: 3W Coffice
venue.address_1: No. 397 South Luoshi Road

description: As an Android application developer, short development cycle and multifarious functions are the biggest stumbling blocks for us. And as the prevalence of AI, how to make applicaton development more efficient and take advantage of AI in our daily work is very urgent. So This meetup will cover.

name: When driving meets AI

venue.name: No.1 Lecture Hall
venue.address_1: HuangJiaDaWan NO.1,City College, Wuhan University of Science and Technology

description:
Artificial intelligence is a new comprehensive technical science or engineering that can be used to perceive, perceive, make decisions, and execute human programs or systems.

     The theme of this lecture is: autonomous driving.The most characteristic application of artificial intelligence in transportation is autonomous driving.Autonomous driving involves many subjects such as environmental perception, intelligent decision making and planning, intelligent control, etc., among which artificial intelligence and cloud computing are key technologies and bottleneck technologies that limit the development of unmanned vehicles.

name: Wuhan GDG DevFest 2017

venue.name: Room701,Building No.1
venue.address_1: Information Department,Wuhan University

description:
GDG DevFest 2017 is our annual all-day developer conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs, hackathon and more!

This year is the first time that Wuhan GDG is hosting DevFest.This activity will involve AI and Android, and we will invite a number of senior professors and development engineers in AI and Android to share

AGENDA:

1:30 PM - 1:40 PM Check-in & Photo

1:40 PM - 2:10 PM Wuhan GDG establishment ceremony

2:10 PM - 4:40 PM Guests bring AI and Android technology to share

4:40 PM - 5:00pm Free exchange sharing

name: Android applications develop new routes-Android&HTML5

venue.name: ROOM 3304,Building NO.3
venue.address_1: HuangJiaDaWan NO.1,City College, Wuhan University of Science and Technology Wuhan, Wuhan

description:
We will talk about:How to match multi-resolution android devices!
How to build HTML5 applications in android?
How to debug HTML5 applications in android?
How to use HTML5 native storage in android?
How do I use HTML5's local database in android?
How do you use HTML5 in android?
How to build HTML5 offline application in android?

name: Computing Thought of Hardware and Software Cooperation

venue.name: Room 411, Building No. 3
venue.address_1: HuangjiahuXi Road # 2,Wuhan University of Science and Technology

description: Hardware and Software are both important for the computing devices including personal computers, mobile devices and high-performance servers. They will have closer relationship to support the computing requirements from different areas. This lecture gives the computing thought of hardware and software cooperation. The relationship will be described from the point of view of thorough hardware and software in this lecture. And a case study will also be given in it.

name: Lectures  about AI and Mobile

venue.name: ROOM 102,Building NO.3
venue.address_1: Liberal Arts Department, Wuhan University

description:
For college students, participating in APP development and invention activities is conducive to stimulating their enthusiasm for innovation so that students can better integrate campus culture ， develop unique mobile APPs and design software interfaces suitable for users' aesthetic concepts. This contest takes the theme of "Science , Technology and Creativity", aiming to inspire the creativity and execution of undergraduates, cultivate the creative accomplishment, practical ability and teamwork of undergraduates.

Lecture Themes:

1.How to make a good app from the point of testers?

2.What is the relationship between AI and mobile?

name: APP Creative Design Competition

venue.name: ROOM 103,Building NO.6 Liberal Arts Department
venue.address_1: Wuhan University

description:
Presentation

15 minutes for each group, and player are free to present their production with APP、Axure、Mock plus、video and so on

Grading

1.APP Design Creativity and Innovation 40%2.APP product style and interface design 40%3.APP Feasibility and Profitability 20%4.Finished products 15% -30% bonus points

Award ceremony

Award ceremony will take place after grading.

name: Advances in Computing Technology

venue.name: Room 411, Building No. 3
venue.address_1: HuangjiahuXi Road # 2,Wuhan University of Science and Technology

description: With the rapid progress in computing technology, emerging areas are hot in research and industry. Google has provided many advances in the emerging topics. They have close relationship with both research and engineering. It is very important to know and understand the new ideas. This lecture gives some introductions and thought of the new technologies. It will help us to master the advances in computing technology.

name: IWD-Building a New Horizon(WuhanGDG WTM)

venue.name: Chongshi Hall, Building Library
venue.address_1: Huangjiahu Campus, Wuhan University of Science and Technology

description: Women techmakers have played more and more important roles in the society. What they do can provide fruitful and resourceful services and achievements. When the IT technologies are in rapid progress, the focuses of this area are changed. AI, Intelligent Hardware and IoT etc. are becoming the hot topics. The environments are also changed. In this activity, some invited speakers will share their experience and the technology advance in the women’s perspective, which is to build a new horizon.

name: IWD-Building a New Horizon(2018WTM Parallel Sessions)

venue.name: No.1 Lecture Hall
venue.address_1: HuangJiaDaWan NO.1,City College, Wuhan University of Science and Technology

description: Women techmakers have played more and more important roles in the society. What they do can provide fruitful and resourceful services and achievements. When the IT technologies are in rapid progress, the focuses of this area are changed. AI, Intelligent Hardware and IoT etc. are becoming the hot topics. The environments are also changed. In this activity, some invited speakers will share their experience and the technology advance in the women’s perspective, which is to build a new horizon.

name: Python and Web Search for Data Collection

venue.name: Floor 1, Building Fiberhome Innovation
venue.address_1: Floor 1, Building Fiberhome Innovation, 88# Road Wuhan Research Institute, Wuhan, Hubei

description: When big data and AI are becoming more and more popular, data support becomes more and more important for the analysis and utilization. Search data from the Internet is the popular way to collect the useful data. Python is one of the mostly used language in this area. In this lecture, the features of python will be discussed and some typical projects will be shared.

name: Embedded Computing Technology in IoT

venue.name: Room 411, Building No. 3
venue.address_1: HuangjiahuXi Road # 2,Wuhan University of Science and Technology

description: Internet of Things (IoT) has been one of the hot topics in recent years. The intelligent small devices with network support are the basis of IoT. Such devices are embedded systems which are prompted by embedded computing technology. Embedded systems are used in IoT to collect the data or response to the instructions. New features are emerging when they are available in IoT. This lecture will give a brief deep analysis for embedded systems in IoT.

name: Introduction of Automotive Electronics

venue.name: Room 411, Building No. 3
venue.address_1: HuangjiahuXi Road # 2,Wuhan University of Science and Technology

description: Automotive Electronics is not a recent concept. Its related technologies have been provided and used in automobiles already. When autopilot is emerging, automotive electronics will play a more important role in this area as the basis. AI is the software foundation of autopilot and the devices in automobiles are the hardware foundation where the data come from. In this lecture, the framework of Automotive Electronics will be given and the future will be also discussed.

name: Google Cloud Computing  - Distributed Database Technology

venue.name: ROOM 3304,Building NO.3
venue.address_1: HuangJiaDaWan NO.1,City College, Wuhan University of Science and Technology Wuhan, Wuhan

description: Cloud computing technology is the infrastructure of most of Google’s applications.Without cloud computing,there is no Google’s innovation service. The key technologies of google cloud computing mainly include:GFS,MapReduce and BigTable,Among them,GFS provides the ability to store and access massive data; MapReduce makes parallel processing of massive information easy; BigTable makes it easy to manage and organize massive data.These technologies make it very common for those services that only super companies were able to enjoy before, and the cost is very low.This lecture gives some introductions and thought of the new technologies. It will help us to master the advances in Cloud Computing technology.

name: The basic use of Tensorflow and the application of text classification

venue.name: No.1 Lecture Hall
venue.address_1: HuangJiaDaWan NO.1,City College, Wuhan University of Science and Technology

description: Tensorflow is google second generation artificial intelligence learning system.Support for python and c++ languages, support algorithms such as CNN, RNN, and LSTM, and can be used for multiple in-depth learning areas such as voice recognition or image processing.It can run in embedded systems (such as mobile phones, tablets), PCS and distributed systems.It is one of the most popular deep learning platforms in the world.This lecture will give a  basic use of Tensorflow and the application of text classification.

name: IWD-Building a New Horizon (from the perspective of the industry)

venue.name: Chongshi Hall, Building Library
venue.address_1: Huangjiahu Campus, Wuhan University of Science and Technology

description: Women techmakers should and will be more important in IT area. When the computing technology is in rapid progress, the technology routine of each women techmaker may be a challenge for them especially the novice developers. What should be the focus? How to catch the emerging hot topics? How to master the skills deeply? In this activity, some invited speakers will share their experience and the technology advance from the perspective of the industry, which is to build a new horizon.

name: IWD-Building a New Horizon (from the perspective of the practice）

venue.name: No.1 Lecture Hall
venue.address_1: HuangJiaDaWan NO.1,City College, Wuhan University of Science and Technology

description: Women techmakers should and will be more important in IT area. When the computing technology is in rapid progress, the technology routine of each women techmaker may be a challenge for them especially the novice developers. What should be the focus? How to catch the emerging hot topics? How to master the skills deeply? In this activity, some invited speakers will share their experience and the technology advance from the perspective of the industry, which is to build a new horizon.

name: IWD-Building a New Horizon (for the industry)
description: Women techmakers will play more important roles in IT industry. The new technology will push all of the developers in continuous learning and developing. There are four hot areas including Android+, Internet of Things, Artificial Intelligent and Big Data. Big Data is taken as the basic support for AI and its related applications. When Ai is becoming the mainstream, Big Data is also becoming more important. Non-relational database can meet the requirements of big data and AI. In this activity, some invited speakers will share their experience and the technology advance in this topic.

name: Using Google Technology in the Projects

venue.name: Room 206, Building No. 3
venue.address_1: #2 Hujianghu West Road, Hongshan District

description: When new projects are designing, the core of such projects is to give them the right and suitable technology framework, especially the projects with given requirements. Google has provided their technologies in different areas such as Artificial Intelligence, Internet of Things, Mobile Computing and Big Data. They are the potential candidates for the designs. In this activity, the topic focuses on using google technology in the projects.

name: 2018 TensorFlow DevSummit Viewing Party(Wuhan GDG)

venue.name: No.1 Lecture Hall
venue.address_1: HuangJiaDaWan NO.1,City College, Wuhan University of Science and Technology

description:
2018 TensorFlow DevSummit Viewing Party is comming !

TensorFlow Dev Summit brings together a diverse mix of machine learning users from around the world for a full day of highly technical talks, demos, and conversation with the TensorFlow team and community.In this event, we will learn about the latest technology of TensorFlow and discuss it through the video of the 2018 TensorFlow DevSummit Viewing Party.

name: Using Tensorflow in NAO Development

venue.name: Room 101,Building No.3
venue.address_1: #2 Huangjiahu West Road,Hongshan district, Wuhan University of Science and Technology

description: AI is becoming the most popular technology in recent days. Google provides the tensorflow as a solution for AI related development. NAO is a type of robotics, which is also popular. In this activity, the experiences will be shared on how to using tensorflow in NAO development. There will be special lecture on AI first. And then the tensorflow will be introduced. The last part is to using tensorflow in real NAOs.

venue.name: Room 101,Building No.3
venue.address_1: #2 Huangjiahu West Road,Hongshan district, Wuhan University of Science and Technology

Google IO convention 2018 with three days in the United States on May 8,9,10, mountain view, if can't go to the scene to Google IO convention, then come to lanzhou GDG community at Google IO Extended activities!Google IO is the annual developer conference held by GuGe company, and Google company will release some cutting-edge technology products every year.

As always, GDG WuHan will host Google I/O Extended activities on the local offline.

Activity time: Beijing time May 8 (Tuesday) - May 9 (Wednesday) early morning, live broadcast with us I/O time synchronization.

name: Artificial intelligence technology based on Android platform

venue.name: No.1 Lecture Hall
venue.address_1: HuangJiaDaWan NO.1,City College, Wuhan University of Science and Technology

description: At present, deep learning algorithm, speech recognition, image recognition and other technologies have been accelerated by the strong support of the infrastructure (data resource and computing power).Data resources, computing power, the core algorithm objectively constitute the three basic elements of artificial intelligence in the current back above a new level, to promote the present artificial intelligence from a computational intelligence to the higher level of perception, cognitive intelligence development, and through the general technology/solution are derived from the output as well as the specific mass of artificial intelligence application products fall to the ground, third trendy of artificial intelligence. The accuracy and speed of TensorFlow in both data input and output is defined as an artificial intelligence tool. The event based on Android platform of artificial intelligence technology, introduces the relevant artificial intelligence technology.

name: Innovation from Technology Development

venue.name: Room 206, Building No. 3
venue.address_1: #2 Hujianghu West Road, Hongshan District

description: When the computer technology is in rapid progress, innovation is becoming more important than before. There are more topics including Artificial intelligence, Internet of Things, Mobile, Big Data which are interrelated. They have provided more opportunities for us to reach the innovations. Each idea may be the giant project based on these technology development. In this discussion, the hot topics will be talked from the point of view of the whole infrastructure.

name: Basic Development Technology for System and Server
description: System and Server needs powerful low-level support. Such work generally was provided by C or C++ language. However, such languages are not easy to master and be used for system and server supports. In this lecture, it will be introduced about the basic development technology for system and server. Some source code and the results will be showed during the lecture.

name: Android: Framework Introduction and Application Development
description: Mobile Apps are still the mainstream in mobile devices. They can provide fruitful services to the users. Android is also still the most important mobile platforms for mobile devices. How to develop apps for Android is always the requirements. In this lecture, the basic framework of Android will be introduced and the app development technology will also be introduced. Some source code and the results will be showed during the lecture.

name: Development Technology for Electronic Business
description: IT supported Electronic Business is widely practiced in the society. The important technology is how to support the server for the large amount of parallel requests and the corresponding responds with big data being processed. In this lecture, the common design and develop0ment technology will be introduced as the main contents. Some source code and the results will be showed during the lecture.

name: Constructing a Project Based on the Suitable Design
description: The projects should be taken carefully from the beginning. The designs of the projects can provide the good startup for the projects. Project design is not only the coding but also the whole project including the management, communication and the coding itself. In this lecture, the content will be introduced about the project design. Some source code and the results will be showed during the lecture.

name: Dynamic Mobile Developing Technology
description: The mobile devices are almost the main devices used to connect to the Internet. Different access methods are provided to retrieve the information from the Internet on such devices. Mobile apps and webs can be provided as the entrances of the information. In this lecture, it will give the introductions of the dynamic mobile developing technology. Some source code and the results will be showed during the lecture.

name: Python Practice in Projects
description: AI especially the deep learning has been the focus. It is eager to how to develop the applications for data collecting, data washing, data storage and data analysis etc. Python is one of the most frequently used languages in AI related developing. It is very suitable for the application coders in upper level developments. In this lecture, python practice will be given. Some source code and the results will be showed during the lecture.

name: Introduction to Python

venue.name: No.1 Lecture Hall
venue.address_1: HuangJiaDaWan NO.1,City College, Wuhan University of Science and Technology

description: Due to the simplicity, readability, and extensibility of the Python language, the use of Python for scientific computing is increasing, and some well-known universities have adopted Python to teach programming courses. Python is a completely object-oriented language. Functions, modules, Numbers, strings are objects. And fully support inheritance, overload, derivation, multiple inheritance, beneficial to enhance the reuse of source code. In the age of artificial intelligence, Python language is becoming more and more important. In this lecture, we will introduce relevant knowledge of Python.Some source code and the results will be showed during the lecture.

name: Introduction to Python

venue.name: Room 5403,HuangJiaDaWan NO.1
venue.address_1: City College, Wuhan University of Science and Technology

description: Due to the simplicity, readability, and extensibility of the Python language, the use of Python for scientific computing is increasing, and some well-known universities have adopted Python to teach programming courses. Python is a completely object-oriented language. Functions, modules, Numbers, strings are objects. And fully support inheritance, overload, derivation, multiple inheritance, beneficial to enhance the reuse of source code. In the age of artificial intelligence, Python language is becoming more and more important. In this lecture, we will introduce relevant knowledge of Python.Some source code and the results will be showed during the lecture.

name: Flutter Live extended 2018

venue.name: Room 206, Building No. 3
venue.address_1: #2 Hujianghu West Road, Hongshan District

description:
Flutter allows developers to build beautiful native apps on Android and iOS from a single codebase. Flutter works with existing code, is used by developers and organizations around the world, and is free and open source. As of today, we have some significant Chinese developers, who are using Flutter in production, including Xianyu (闲鱼) at Alibaba, Now Live at Tencent and JD Finance etc.

GDGWuhan will organize Flutter Live extended activities, watch Flutter Live held in London on December 4th online. we will hold this activity in two venues of wuhan university of science and technology and wuhan institute of city of science and technology, welcome all of you to attend nearby！

name: Career Planning of Female Scientists in AI Environment

venue.name: CongShi Hall,Wuhan University of Science and Technology
venue.address_1: #2 Huangjiahu West Road, Hongshan District ,Wuhan

description:
Artificial intelligence (AI) will bring more changes to human beings than the Internet, electricity and industrial revolution. Because it permeates every industry and every job, it will change, subvert and replace 50% of the people in ten years. It will change some of the ways we do things, so it is faster and more influential than the Internet.
As a half of the society, there are many active female technicians around us. We will invite engineers from ThoughtWorks, a well-known IT company, to share their views on the career of female technicians.

TF Dev Summit schedule:[masked]
01:30-01:50 Keynote
01:50-02:15 TensorFlow 2.0
02:15-02:45 TF Lite

WuhanGDG QQ Group:[masked]

name: TensorFlow Dev Summit Extended 2019
description:
The TensorFlow Dev Summit 2019, which is expected by global machine learning developers, was held at Google Event Center in Sunnyvale, California. At the conference, TensorFlow team released the version of TensorFlow 2.0 Alpha, an open source machine learning framework, which Google calls simpler, more intuitive and easier to use. The new version uses Keras advanced APIs to simplify the use of frameworks, and many APIs that are considered redundant (such as Slim and Layers APIs) will be discarded. The release is scheduled for full release in the second quarter of this year, and users can now take the lead in experiencing it.

GDG Wuhan will hold TensorFlow Dev Summit Extended 2019 to review viewing partyd's release videos, conduct ML training and study jam on March 20.

You are welcome to participate actively.
